readme: This file is to be used with AccuBooks AI app, loads all the prompt created for each section

promo_banner.title: I'll figure out something to put here soon.
promo_banner.description: For a very limited time, you will be presented with this screen.

promo_banner.title: Something good coming
promo_banner.description: Soon I will think of a gift to give

ama_prompt: You are a sweet and kind experienced accountant named Janell, introduce yourself and be sure to greet the client by their name. Do not use any inappropriate language and ensure you inform them that you are not a professional accountant. Your job is to provide free but accurate information by asking questions then offering advice or guidance based on the information provided. Make sure you only respond with one question at a time. Keep the answers short and easy to understand. Make sure to ask about which state and county they live in as each state has different laws and take their age into consideration when responding.

prompt_list_personal.title: Tax Deductions and Credits
prompt_list_personal.description: Common personal tax deduction and credits questions.
prompt_list_personal.prompt: Provide detailed information on common personal tax deductions and credits, including criteria and how to claim them.

prompt_list_personal.title: Retirement Savings Plans
prompt_list_personal.prompt: Explain the different types of retirement savings plans (e.g., IRA, 401(k), Roth IRA) and the tax implications of each.

prompt_list_personal.title: Education Savings Accounts
prompt_list_personal.prompt: Describe the options for education savings, such as 529 Plans or Coverdell Education Savings Accounts, and their tax benefits.

prompt_list_personal.title: Investment Income and Capital Gains
prompt_list_personal.prompt: Discuss how investment income and capital gains are taxed, including strategies to minimize taxes on these types of income.

prompt_list_personal.title: Estate Planning and Inheritance Tax
prompt_list_personal.prompt: Outline key considerations in estate planning, including how inheritance tax works and ways to prepare for it.

prompt_list_personal.title: Managing Debt and Credit
prompt_list_personal.prompt: Provide advice on managing personal debt and credit scores, including implications on personal taxes and financial health.

prompt_list_personal.title: Healthcare Expenses and Tax Deductions
prompt_list_personal.prompt: Elaborate on how to manage and deduct healthcare expenses, including Health Savings Accounts (HSAs) and Flexible Spending Accounts (FSAs).

prompt_list_personal.title: Charitable Donations
prompt_list_personal.prompt: Guide users through the tax benefits and requisites for claiming charitable donations on their personal tax returns.

prompt_list_personal.title: Tax Implications of Life Events
prompt_list_personal.prompt: Explore common life events such as marriage, divorce, or having children and their impact on personal tax situations.

prompt_list_personal.title: Foreign Income and Assets Reporting
prompt_list_personal.prompt: Advise on the requirements for reporting foreign income and assets for individuals, including the FBAR and FATCA regulations.

prompt_list_personal.title: Personal Budgeting and Financial Planning
prompt_list_personal.prompt: Offer tips on creating a sustainable personal budget and a long-term financial plan, including savings and debt repayment strategies.

prompt_list_personal.title: Renting vs. Buying Home Considerations
prompt_list_personal.prompt: Discuss the financial implications of renting versus buying a home, including tax considerations and building equity.

prompt_list_business.title: Small Business Taxation
prompt_list_business.prompt: Explain the tax responsibilities for small businesses, including quarterly payments, self-employment taxes, and deductions.

prompt_list_business.title: Accounting Software and Tools
prompt_list_business.prompt: Recommend various accounting software and tools for different sizes of businesses and their functionalities.

prompt_list_business.title: Payroll and Employee Benefits
prompt_list_business.prompt: Detail the process of setting up payroll systems and managing employee benefits, including tax withholdings and filings.

prompt_list_business.title: Business Entity Selection
prompt_list_business.prompt: Advise on the pros and cons of different business structures (e.g., LLC, S-Corp, C-Corp) in terms of taxation and liability.

prompt_list_business.title: Audits and Compliance
prompt_list_business.prompt: Discuss how to prepare for business audits, ensure compliance with tax laws, and maintain proper accounting records.

prompt_list_business.title: International Business and Taxation
prompt_list_business.prompt: Inform about the tax implications of doing business internationally, including VAT, international tax treaties, and transfer pricing.

prompt_list_business.title: Cost Accounting and Pricing Strategies
prompt_list_business.prompt: Inform about cost accounting principles and how they feed into pricing strategies and profit margin calculations for businesses.

prompt_list_business.title: Revenue Recognition and Financial Reporting
prompt_list_business.prompt: Detail the standards for revenue recognition and their implications for financial reporting and business decisions.

prompt_list_business.title: Mergers and Acquisitions (M&A) Accounting
prompt_list_business.prompt: Describe the accounting considerations and tax implications during a merger or acquisition process.

prompt_list_business.title: Inventory Management and Accounting
prompt_list_business.prompt: Teach the methods of inventory accounting (e.g., FIFO, LIFO, weighted average) and their impact on business finances.

prompt_list_business.title: Cash Flow Analysis
prompt_list_business.prompt: Provide guidance on how to conduct a cash flow analysis and why it's a critical component of business financial health.

prompt_list_business.title: E-Commerce and Digital Business Taxation
prompt_list_business.prompt: Explain the tax obligations and considerations for businesses operating in the e-commerce and digital spaces.
